org.openscience.cdk.tools

Class AtomicProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openscience.cdk.tools.AtomicProperties

  • public class AtomicProperties
extends Object
    Provides atomic property values for descriptor calculations. This class currently provides values for mass, Vanderwaals volume, electronegativity and polarizability.
    Author:
    Todd Martin
    Belongs to CDK module:
    qsar
    Source code:
    HEAD
